name: Troy's Quest - Interactive Game / Audio Book - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
name_original: Troy's Quest - Interactive Game / Audio Book - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
description:
Interactive Game - Accessible Game For Blind / Disabled Gamers

Has options for accessible one / two button control.

Audio instructions making it suitable for blind gamers.

Troy's Quest

You Choose The Plot In This Interactive Book & Game

Specially Designed To Make It Highly Accessible

Includes Written Text & Spoken Dialogue 

The Game Can Be Controlled And Interacted With Just Left & Right Button Presses or Keyboard or Screen Taps or Via a Switch Enabled Device

Do You Have What It Takes To Help Troy Recover The Four Elements And Help Save His Kingdom From The Malevolent Elves?

You Decide The Plot In This Interactive Book & Game
